page.title: 19SHOPPING & MOBILE SHOPS
page.content: (See page 12 for details of the survey we carried out.) The only shop in our area is the Post Office which is used by over half of the families. The travelling shops may be very important to people living here, especially the 14% who do not own a car. We asked families which of the travelling services they used and the results were as follows: Butcher's van 28%, Mobile grocers 22%, Vegetable man 14%, Ice cream van 21%, Fish and chip van 7% and Mobile library 16%, Other services include a Video van, and a Crisp and pop van but these weren't very well used. We have one public house which 27% of families used. We found that Millom, 3 miles away, was used by 91% of the families for most of their shopping. Two families relied entirely on the travelling services for their shopping.
